174.alpha: Igglybuff has a soft and plushy body that feels very much like a marshmallow. From this body wafts a gently sweet fragrance that soothes and calms the emotions of its foes.

319.omega: Nicknamed “the bully of the sea, Sharpedo is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off. Just one of these Pokemon can thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.
319.alpha: Sharpedo can swim at speeds of up to 75 mph by jetting seawater out of its backside. This Pokemon's drawback is its inability to swim long distances.

675.omega: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won't put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
675.alpha: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.

377.omega: Regirock was sealed away by people long ago. If this Pokemon's body is damaged in battle, it is said to seek out suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.
377.alpha: Regirock's body is composed entirely of rocks. Recently, a study made the startling discovery that the rocks were all unearthed from different locations.

175.omega: As its energy, Togepi uses the positive emotions of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and Pokemon. This Pokemon stores up feelings of happiness inside its shell, then shares them with others.
175.alpha: As its energy, Togepi uses the positive emotions of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and Pokemon. This Pokemon stores up feelings of happiness inside its shell, then shares them with others.

576.omega: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
576.alpha: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

278.omega: Wingull has the habit of carrying prey and valuables in its beak and hiding them in all sorts of locations. This Pokemon rides the winds and flies as if it were skating across the sky.
278.alpha: Wingull rides updrafts rising from the sea by extending its long and narrow wings to glide. This Pokemon's long beak is useful for catching prey.

176.omega: Togetic is said to be a Pokemon that brings good fortune. When the Pokemon spots someone who is pure of heart, it is said to appear and share its happiness with that person.
176.alpha: Togetic is said to be a Pokemon that brings good fortune. When the Pokemon spots someone who is pure of heart, it is said to appear and share its happiness with that person.

477.omega: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.
477.alpha: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.

177.omega: Natu cannot fly because its wings are not yet fully grown. If your eyes meet with this Pokemon's eyes, it will stare back intently at you. But if you move even slightly, it will hop away to safety.
177.alpha: Natu has a highly developed jumping ability. The Pokemon flaps and leaps onto tree branches that are taller than grown-up people to pick at the tree's new shoots.

178.omega: Xatu stands rooted and still in one spot all day long. People believe that this Pokemon does so out of fear of the terrible things it has foreseen in the future.
178.alpha: Xatu is known to stand motionless while staring at the sun all day long. Some people revere it as a mystical Pokemon out of their belief that Xatu is in possession of the power to see into the future.

676.omega: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.
676.alpha: Historically, in the Kalos region, these Pokemon were the designated guardians of the king.

378.omega: Regice's body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozen body can't be melted, even by fire. This Pokemon controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
378.alpha: Regice cloaks itself with frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit. Things will freeze solid just by going near this Pokemon. Its icy body is so cold, it will not melt even if it is immersed in magma.

540.omega: This Pokemon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.
540.alpha: Since this Pokemon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

577.omega: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.
577.alpha: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.

279.omega: Pelipper is a flying transporter that carries small Pokemon and eggs inside its massive bill. This Pokemon builds its nest on steep cliffs facing the sea.
279.alpha: Pelipper searches for food while in flight by skimming the wave tops. This Pokemon dips its large bill in the sea to scoop up food, then swallows everything in one big gulp.

179.omega: Mareep's fluffy coat of wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more static electricity is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the tip of its tail glows.
179.alpha: Mareep's fluffy coat of wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more static electricity is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the tip of its tail glows.

478.omega: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees Fahrenheit. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.
478.alpha: Legends in snowy regions say that a woman who was lost on an icy mountain was reborn as Froslass.

541.omega: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
541.alpha: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.

542.omega: Upon finding a small Pokemon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
542.alpha: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.

677.omega: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.
677.alpha: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself, but it has no control over its power.

379.omega: Registeel has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this Pokemon eats.
379.alpha: Registeel was imprisoned by people in ancient times. The metal composing its body is thought to be a curious substance that is not of this earth.

543.omega: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
543.alpha: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokemon that try to prey on it.

578.omega: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.
578.alpha: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.

544.omega: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.
544.alpha: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.

545.omega: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.
545.alpha: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

479.omega: Research continues on this Pokemon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.
479.alpha: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

546.omega: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.
546.alpha: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.

547.omega: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.
547.alpha: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.

678.omega: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.
678.alpha: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.

548.omega: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
548.alpha: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.
